Container.Name: idrac6
Container.Overview: Allows access to the iDRAC 6 console without installing Java or messing with Java Web Start. Java is only run inside of the container and access is provided via web interface or directly with VNC.
Container.Description: Allows access to the iDRAC 6 console without installing Java or messing with Java Web Start. Java is only run inside of the container and access is provided via web interface or directly with VNC.

Config.Name: idrac host
Config.Description: Host for your iDRAC instance. Make sure your instance is reachable with https://IDRAC_HOST;. See IDRAC_PORT for using custom ports. HTTPS is always used.

Config.Name: idrac port
Config.Description: The optional port for the web interface.

Config.Name: keyboard fix
Config.Description: If you have issues with keyboard input, try setting this to true.

Config.Name: Virtual media
Config.Description: Can be used to allow virtual media to be mounted.

Config.Name: Libraries
Config.Description: Libraries downloaded from your iDRAC instance will be stored here. Add a volume to cache those files for a faster container startup.
